keyMoments.title: Hancock Saves Luffy from Smoker
keyMoments.description: Hancock furiously intervenes when Smoker pins Luffy down, openly defying her Warlord status to protect Luffy by attacking a Marine officer.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's complete loyalty to Luffy over her obligations to the World Government, publicly revealing her allegiance.
keyMoments.quote: I am deafened by anger! I will kill you!

keyMoments.title: Hancock Demonstrates Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Hancock uses Armament Haki to strike Smoker, a Logia-type Devil Fruit user, demonstrating her mastery of this advanced technique.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Hancock using Armament Haki in combat, showing how it can counter Logia intangibility.

abilities.description: Hancock demonstrates the ability to use Armament Haki to strike Logia users like Smoker, allowing her to make physical contact with normally intangible bodies.

relationships.description: Hancock is deeply in love with Luffy and will sacrifice everything to protect him, including her Warlord position
Hancock attacks Smoker for threatening Luffy, declaring her intent to kill him

reveals.information: First clear demonstration of Hancock's Armament Haki in combat
Hancock publicly defies her Warlord duties to protect Luffy from Marine forces

keyMoments.title: Smoker Attacks Luffy at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Smoker engages Luffy in combat after Tashigi spots him, using his Moku Moku no Mi powers and Seastone jitte to pin Luffy down.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the long-running rivalry between Smoker and Luffy, showing Smoker's increased strength and determination.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Attacked by Hancock
keyMoments.description: Smoker is kicked away by Hancock's Armament Haki when he tries to capture Luffy, forcing him to retreat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the limitations of Logia intangibility against Haki users and demonstrates Hancock's superior combat ability.
keyMoments.quote: Are you going to resign from the Shichibukai as well?

relationships.description: Smoker continues his pursuit of Luffy, determined to capture the pirate
Hancock attacks Smoker for threatening Luffy

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Confronts Transformed Kuma
keyMoments.description: Ivankov encounters Bartholomew Kuma on the battlefield but discovers that Kuma no longer recognizes him and attacks without hesitation.
keyMoments.significance: Heartbreaking moment showing the tragedy of Kuma's transformation and Ivankov's loss of a friend.

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Learns About Kuma's Fate
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals to Ivankov that Kuma has lost all of his will and humanity, becoming a complete Pacifista weapon.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation about Kuma's sacrifice and the World Government's cruel experiments.

relationships.description: Ivankov considers Kuma an old friend and Revolutionary Army comrade, making the revelation of his transformation deeply painful
Ivankov fights alongside Luffy at Marineford to save Ace

reveals.information: Ivankov's deep friendship with Kuma is revealed through his emotional reaction to Kuma's transformation

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Kuma's Complete Transformation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals that Kuma has been fully transformed into Pacifista PX-0 and has lost all of his will and humanity.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation explaining Kuma's behavior and the extent of Dr. Vegapunk's modifications.

relationships.description: Former friend and Revolutionary Army comrade, now unable to recognize Ivankov due to complete transformation

reveals.information: Kuma has lost all of his will and humanity, becoming a complete Pacifista weapon (PX-0)

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Defeats Gecko Moria
keyMoments.description: Jinbe intercepts Moria's attack on Luffy and quickly defeats the fellow Warlord using his Fish-Man Karate.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's strength and commitment to protecting Luffy during the war.

relationships.description: Jinbe fights to protect Luffy at Marineford
Jinbe defeats Moria when he tries to attack Luffy

keyMoments.title: Buggy Forms Alliance with Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Buggy is manipulated by Whitebeard into forming an alliance, gaining the support of the Impel Down prisoners under his command.
keyMoments.significance: Further inflates Buggy's undeserved reputation as his followers see him treated as Whitebeard's equal.

relationships.description: Buggy forms a temporary alliance with Whitebeard during the Marineford War
